body.name: SYLVOX 43 inch Outdoor TV, Smart TV Waterproof 4K LED Outdoor Television with Dual Speakers, Ultra-Thin High Resolution, Support Bluetooth & Wi-Fi, Deck Series Suitable for Partial Sun Areas
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 5 mins
features: 【IP55 Waterproof Outdoor TV】 Sylvox Outdoor TV is specially designed for outdoor entertainment. The all-metal shell can be effectively waterproof, windproof and dustproof, and can adapt to various outdoor weather conditions. Suitable for partial sun areas such as patios, porches, swimming pools and more.

【Ultra 4K HDR Display】 The outdoor smart television is equipped with 3840*2160 resolution (4K), 1000 nits brightness, and ultra-wide color gamut of picture levels and details create stunning picture quality, more obvious details, and stronger sense of hierarchy, allowing you to immerse yourself in wonderful visual enjoyment.

【Advanced Smart TV】 Built-in Netflix, Pandora, Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, Accu Weather, Mirroacast RX. Support Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. Streaming technology, devices can be connected to the 43inch smart TV to play directly, and external devices can control the volume synchronously, more compatible.

【Ultra-Narrow Bezel & Unique Cooling】 The appearance of the outdoor TV is simple and elegant, and the ultra-narrow frame effectively increases the display area and realizes an ultra-wide video screen. The unique heat dissipation technology can accelerate the air circulation, even if the screen is exposed to the sun for a long time, the screen will not be black.

【Product Warranty】 We take full responsibility for the outdoor TV, if there is any problem with the 43inch television you received, please feel free to contact us, we provide every customer with 30-day return and one-year warranty service to ensure you have a wonderful shopping experience.

Can I download APP on this TV? This TV cannot download APPs, only built-in APPs can be used. Does it support screencast function? Yes, but only supports Android devices to cast screens, doesn‘t iOS devices. What is the applicable VESA size? Designed for wall mounting, VESA standard 43" 400×200mm, 55" 400×200mm or 600*400, 65" 400×400mm or 600*400, 75" 600×400mm. Tips on Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connection 1. Wi-Fi signals work best in the 2.4GHz. 2. The distance 16feet(5M) or shorter is recommended for the router to the TV. 3. When connecting for the first time, T.V. Bluetooth frequency range to Bluetooth speakers works best under 3 feet (1M).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Brilliant Outdoor Viewing Experience: SYLVOX 43-inch Outdoor TV Review
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the SYLVOX 43-inch Outdoor TV, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations in every way. From its impressive brightness to its flawless performance, this outdoor TV has truly enhanced my outdoor entertainment experience.Let's start with the standout feature: brightness. The SYLVOX 43-inch Outdoor TV boasts exceptional brightness levels, making it perfect for outdoor use even in broad daylight. Whether I'm enjoying a daytime sports event or hosting an evening movie night, the screen remains vivid and clear, ensuring every detail is beautifully displayed. The TV's anti-glare technology further adds to the overall visual quality, allowing for comfortable viewing in various lighting conditions.Speaking of performance, this TV delivers exactly what it promises. The picture quality is outstanding, with vibrant colors and sharp contrasts that bring content to life. Whether I'm watching my favorite TV shows, movies, or playing video games, the SYLVOX 43-inch Outdoor TV offers an immersive experience that rivals indoor televisions. The audio quality is also impressive, providing clear and immersive sound that enhances the overall viewing pleasure.What truly sets SYLVOX apart is their exceptional customer service. From the moment I reached out with inquiries about the product to after-sales support, their team has been nothing short of fantastic. They were responsive, knowledgeable, and genuinely committed to ensuring my satisfaction. It's refreshing to find a company that values its customers and goes the extra mile to address any concerns promptly.Durability is another notable aspect of this outdoor TV. It is built to withstand various weather conditions, with its sturdy construction and weatherproof design. Rain or shine, the SYLVOX 43-inch Outdoor TV performs flawlessly, ensuring uninterrupted entertainment regardless of the elements.In summary, the SYLVOX 43-inch Outdoor TV has impressed me on multiple fronts. Its exceptional brightness, flawless performance, and robust durability make it a top choice for outdoor entertainment. Furthermore, the outstanding customer service provided by the company has made the entire experience even more enjoyable. If you're in the market for an outdoor TV that delivers on its promises, the SYLVOX 43-inch Outdoor TV is a definite winner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great picture. Box seems to be put together well and so far has weathered a couple of storms. *with cover.Awful speakers. Be prepared to add an additional sound option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Met my expectations
reviews.reviewText: The outdoor tv arrived on time and secure. I had fundamental questions to ensure the TV worked as I expected and after a few conversations with the support team I was contacted by Maggie who made the experience much better. A few email transactions later I was able to get the TV to work as I expected. Thank you to Maggie for the assistance! I would recommend this product for the excellent support as well as the quality of outdoor TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars initially a bit disappointed but the after sales service is excellent
reviews.reviewText: This TV does not come with a stand or wall attachment. You will need to buy those separately.It has a fan to keep it cool which impacts sound a little. The fan is needed to keep the TV cool on a hot day and prolong its life.The picture quality and brightness are very good.It is best to get a sound bar if you do not intend to wire the TV into your sound system as the built in speakers produce sound that is a bit distorted with a (sometimes) rattle.Netflix and Prime and some other services are built in but if you want Apple TV, for example, you will need to stream from a firestick or the like. You can't download them but there is a streaming option built in.The after sales service could not have been better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this tv
reviews.reviewText: We've had this 55" Sylvox for a week now and can't stop watching it. Picture is magnificent!!! I bought a separate cover for extra protection. You can't go wrong with this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars great tv - horrible sound quality - def need to purchase a sound bar
reviews.reviewText: Was super excited to get this tv. it came broken but the seller immediately rectified it with ease so i was very impressed. The only issue with the tv would have to be the loudness and quality of the sound. you really have to turn the volume up almost all the way to hear the tv. I will definately have to invest in a sound bar for outside. Now just have to find one for outside that doesn't cost arm and a leg. HELP. but def a good tv.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good at night
reviews.reviewText: Excellent weather proofing, decent sound, great picture at night... During the day everything is washed out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Its so dark you cannot see anything.
reviews.reviewText: Cannot see anything on the TV, even at night time its barely useable

reviews.reviewTitle: Well built, but don't expect 1000 nits
reviews.reviewText: I'll make this fairly short and sweet. First, the good:The TV has a good bit of heft to it and the protective case feels quite solid, well constructed and is sealed well. I'm confident this would be well protected from the elements. I also liked the design and size of the rear compartment to access HDMI and other inputs. It looks like the connections are likewise well protected. Picture wise, it was clear as expected and had zero dead pixels.Next, the not so good:The specs claim 1000 nits brightness, but unfortunately my impression after doing a side by side comparison with my Sony X900H (about 450 to 500 nits max with SDR, 700 nits max for peak HDR) is that the Sylvox is only about on par with the Sony. The current Samsung 4K TV that I use outdoors (deck) is about 360 to 400 nits with SDR but I wanted something quite a bit brighter. Since my needs are for a very bright SDR image outdoors to watch baseball during the summer I wanted something that could truly approach 800 nits SDR minimum. Sadly this model isn't it.While the Sylvox is definitely brighter than your average SDR HDTV (and I think most people will be happy with the brightness if using under a covered deck) anyone who wants an ultra bright image may want to spend extra on the next model up (rated at 2000 nits, should be at least 1000).A couple of other things you need to be aware of is that this is not a "smart" TV. It isn't a really a negative per se since you can install a relatively inexpensive Fire TV 4K MAX in the rear compartment easily where it's also protected, and well supported.Lastly, I have a sneaking suspicion that the included remote is not water resistant. It feels cheap and plasticky, so don't get it wet. Better still, install a Fire TV 4K MAX and use that remote instead after you've done your basic TV picture calibrations / setup. Another nitpic is the screws that secure the rear compartment panel. They're tightened by finger but too smooth to get a good grip sometimes.
